// Investing in Gold bottom sheet Investing in Gold You can buy and sell gold at any time from as minimum as 0.1 gram Gold price goes up and down, so you can follow up the prices from the graph The money will be deducted from your balance if you buy gold & will be added to your balance if you sell it You won\u2019t be able to physically receive your invested gold unless it\u2019s 8 grams Your invested gold will be securely stored by our partner \u201cMngm\u201d I Understand
